1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-2.0.3.0: Support more JOINTS_n and WEIGHTS_n, and various bug fix.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-2.0.2.0: More proper solution to the POM of BSL Shaders.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-2.0.0.1: Fix Exception not causing game crash but causing game hang during model loading.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-2.0.0.0: Update to meet Vanilla's minimun OpenGL requirement.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-1.2.0.1: Fix animation cause game crash, and an optimization forgot to reimplement in last update.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-1.2.0.0: This update break compatibility with previous version, please visit homepage for more info.
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-1.0.1.0: Multi Threaded Model Loading and Custom RenderedGltfModel
1.12.2.1.12.2-Forge-1.0.0.2: Fix compatibility issue with parallax occlusion mapping (POM) of any BSL based shader
